block.p: Brooke Ilana Ackerman, a daughter of Judith and Leonard I. Ackerman of East Hampton, N.Y., was married there last evening to Ross Michael Bick, a son of Marcia Bick of Stamford, Conn., and the late David Bick. Rabbi David Gelfand performed the ceremony at the Jewish Center of the Hamptons.

Mrs. Ackerman Bick is an interior designer at Peter Marino Architects in New York. She graduated from Syracuse University. Her father is a founding partner of Ackerman & Wainwright, an East Hampton law firm. Her mother is a director and former co-chairwoman for fund-raising at the Retreat, a shelter for abused women of eastern Long Island, based in East Hampton.

Brooke Ilana Ackerman, a daughter of Judith and Leonard I. Ackerman of East Hampton, N.Y., was married there last evening to Ross Michael Bick, a son of Marcia Bick of Stamford, Conn., and the late David Bick. Rabbi David Gelfand performed the ceremony at the Jewish Center of the Hamptons.

Mrs. Ackerman Bick is an interior designer at Peter Marino Architects in New York. She graduated from Syracuse University. Her father is a founding partner of Ackerman & Wainwright, an East Hampton law firm. Her mother is a director and former co-chairwoman for fund-raising at the Retreat, a shelter for abused women of eastern Long Island, based in East Hampton.

Mr. Bick is an assistant vice president in the clearing services group at Spear, Leeds & Kellogg, a securities brokerage and specialist firm in New York. He graduated from the University of Hartford. His mother is the director of education for the United Jewish Federation of Greater Stamford. His father was the managing director of Manhattan Capital Partners, a New York-based real estate firm.
